# Language Reference Docs

- [Unsafe code and pointers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/unsafe-code.md): Learn about unsafe code, pointers, and function pointers. C# requires you to declare an unsafe context to use these features to directly manipulate memory or function pointers (unmanaged delegates).
- [Preprocessor directives](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/preprocessor-directives.md): Learn the different C# preprocessor directives that control conditional compilation, warnings, nullable analysis, and more

## Language version

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/language-versioning.md): Learn about how the C# language version is determined based on your project and the reasons behind that choice.
- [Configure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/configure-language-version.md): Learn how to override the default C# language version manually. The C# compiler can support any language version up to the version in the installed SDK.

## Children

- [Attributes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/attributes/llms.txt)
- [Builtin Types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/llms.txt)

- [Compiler Options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/llms.txt)
- [Keywords](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/llms.txt)
- [Operators](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/operators/llms.txt)
